Armor-Piercing Rounds.description: Deal an additional 20% damage (+20% per stack) to bosses.
Armor-Piercing Rounds.name: Armor-Piercing Rounds

Backup Magazine.description: Add +1 (+1 per stack) charge of your Secondary skill.
Backup Magazine.name: Backup Magazine
Backup Magazine.flavorText: Add an extra charge of your Secondary skill.

Bundle of Fireworks.description: Activating an interactable launches 8 (+4 per stack) fireworks that deal 300% base damage.
Bundle of Fireworks.name: Bundle of Fireworks
Bundle of Fireworks.flavorText: Activating an interactable launches fireworks at nearby enemies.

Bustling Fungus.description: After standing still for 2 seconds, create a zone that heals for 4.5% (+2.25% per stack) of your health every second to all allies within 3m (+1.5m per stack).
Bustling Fungus.name: Bustling Fungus
Bustling Fungus.flavorText: Heal all nearby allies after standing still for 2 seconds.

Cautious Slug.description: Increases passive health regeneration by 3 hp/s (+3 hp/s per stack) while outside of combat.
Cautious Slug.name: Cautious Slug

Crowbar.description: Deal 150% (+50% per stack) damage to enemies above 90% health.
Crowbar.name: Crowbar
Crowbar.flavorText: Deal more damage to healthy enemies.

Energy Drink.description: Sprint speed is improved by 30% (+20% per stack).
Energy Drink.name: Energy Drink

Fresh Meat.description: Increases base health regeneration by +2 hp/s for 3s (+3s per stack) after killing an enemy.
Fresh Meat.name: Fresh Meat
Fresh Meat.flavorText: Regenerate health after killing an enemy.

Gasoline.description: Killing an enemy ignites all enemies within 12m (+4m per stack). Enemies burn for 150% (+75% per stack) base damage.
Gasoline.name: Gasoline
Gasoline.flavorText: Killing enemies sets nearby enemies on fire.

Lens-Maker's Glasses.description: Your attacks have a 10% (+10% per stack) chance to 'Critically Strike', dealing double damage.
Lens-Maker's Glasses.name: Lens-Maker's Glasses
Lens-Maker's Glasses.flavorText: Chance to 'Critically Strike', dealing double damage.

Medkit.description: Heal for 10 (+10 per stack) health 1.1 seconds after getting hurt.
Medkit.name: Medkit
Medkit.flavorText: Receive a delayed heal after taking damage.

Monster Tooth.description: Killing an enemy spawns a healing orb that heals for 8 (+8 per stack) health.
Monster Tooth.name: Monster Tooth
Monster Tooth.flavorText: Drop a healing orb on kill.

Paul's Goat Hoof.description: Increases movement speed by 14% (+14% per stack).
Paul's Goat Hoof.name: Paul's Goat Hoof

Personal Shield Generator.description: Gain a shield equal to 8% (+8% per stack) of your maximum health. Recharges outside of danger.
Personal Shield Generator.name: Personal Shield Generator

Rusted Key.description: A hidden cache containing an item will appear in a random location on each stage. (Increases rarity of the item per stack).
Rusted Key.name: Rusted Key
Rusted Key.flavorText: Gain access to a Rusty Lockbox that contains treasure.

Soldier's Syringe.description: Increases attack speed by 15% (+15% per stack).
Soldier's Syringe.name: Soldier's Syringe

Sticky Bomb.description: 5% (+5% per stack) chance on hit to attach a bomb to an enemy, detonating for 180% TOTAL damage.
Sticky Bomb.name: Sticky Bomb
Sticky Bomb.flavorText: Chance on hit to attach a bomb to enemies.

Stun Grenade.description: 5% (+5% on stack) chance on hit to stun enemies for 2 seconds.
Stun Grenade.name: Stun Grenade

Topaz Brooch.description: Gain a temporary barrier on kill for 15 health (+15 per stack).
Topaz Brooch.name: Topaz Brooch
Topaz Brooch.flavorText: Gain a temporary barrier on kill.

Tougher Times.description: 15% (+15% per stack) chance to block incoming damage. Unaffected by luck.
Tougher Times.name: Tougher Times

Tri-Tip Dagger.description: 15% (+15% per stack) chance to bleed an enemy for 240% base damage.
Tri-Tip Dagger.name: Tri-Tip Dagger
Tri-Tip Dagger.flavorText: Chance to bleed enemies on hit.

Warbanner.description: On level up drop a banner that strengthens all allies within 16m (+8m per stack). Raise attack and movement speed by 30%.
Warbanner.name: Warbanner
Warbanner.flavorText: Drop a Warbanner on leveling up, giving you great strength.

AtG Missile Mk. 1.description: 10% chance to fire a missile that deals 300% (+300% per stack) TOTAL damage.
AtG Missile Mk. 1.name: AtG Missile Mk. 1

Bandolier.description: 18% (+10% per stack) chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that resets all skill cooldowns.
Bandolier.name: Bandolier
Bandolier.flavorText: Chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that resets all skill cooldowns.

Berzerker's Pauldron.description: Killing 3 enemies within 1 second sends you into a frenzy for 6s (+4s per stack). Increases movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%.
Berzerker's Pauldron.name: Berzerker's Pauldron
Berzerker's Pauldron.flavorText: Enter a frenzy after killing 3 enemies in quick succession.

Chronobauble.description: Slow enemies on hit for -60% movement speed for 2s (+2s per stack).
Chronobauble.name: Chronobauble

Fuel Cell.description: Hold an additional equipment charge (+1 per stack). Reduce equipment cooldown by 15% (+15% per stack).
Fuel Cell.name: Fuel Cell
Fuel Cell.flavorText: Hold an additional equipment charge. Reduce equipment cooldown.

Ghor's Tome.description: 4% (+4% on stack) chance on kill to drop a treasure worth $25. Scales over time.
Ghor's Tome.name: Ghor's Tome
Ghor's Tome.flavorText: Chance on kill to drop a treasure.

Harvester's Scythe.description: Gain 5% critical chance (+0% per stack). Critical strikes heal for 8 (+4 per stack) health.
Harvester's Scythe.name: Harvester's Scythe

Hopoo Feather.description: Gain +1 (+1 per stack) maximum jump count.
Hopoo Feather.name: Hopoo Feather

Infusion.description: Killing an enemy increases your health permanently by 1, up to a maximum of 100 (+100 per stack) health.
Infusion.name: Infusion
Infusion.flavorText: Killing an enemy permanently increases your health, up to 100.

Kjaro's Band.description: 8% chance on hit to strike an enemy with a runic flame tornado, dealing 500% (+250% per stack) TOTAL damage.
Kjaro's Band.name: Kjaro's Band
Kjaro's Band.flavorText: Chance on hit to strike an enemy with a runic flame tornado.

Leeching Seed.description: Dealing damage heals you for 1 (+1 per stack) health.
Leeching Seed.name: Leeching Seed

Lepton Daisy.description: Release a healing nova during the Teleporter event, healing all nearby allies for 50% of their maximum health. Occurs 1 (+1 per stack) times.
Lepton Daisy.name: Lepton Daisy
Lepton Daisy.flavorText: Periodically release a healing nova during the Teleporter event.

Old Guillotine.description: Instantly kill Elite monsters below 20% (+20% per stack) health.
Old Guillotine.name: Old Guillotine
Old Guillotine.flavorText: Instantly kill low health Elite monsters.

Old War Stealthkit.description: Chance on taking damage to gain 40% movement speed and invisibility for 3s (+1.5s per stack). Chance increases the more damage you take.
Old War Stealthkit.name: Old War Stealthkit
Old War Stealthkit.flavorText: Turn invisible on taking heavy damage.

Predatory Instincts.description: Gain 5% critical chance (+0% per stack). Critical strikes increase attack speed by 12%. Maximum cap of 36% (+24% per stack) attack speed.
Predatory Instincts.name: Predatory Instincts
Predatory Instincts.flavorText: 'Critical Strikes' increase attack speed. Stacks 3 times.

Razorwire.description: Getting hit causes you to explode in a burst of razors, dealing 160% damage. Hits up to 5 (+2 per stack) targets in a 25m (+10m per stack) radius
Razorwire.name: Razorwire
Razorwire.flavorText: Retaliate in a burst of razors on taking damage.

Red Whip.description: Leaving combat boosts your movement speed by 30% (+30% per stack).
Red Whip.name: Red Whip

Rose Buckler.description: Increase armor by 30 (+30 per stack) while sprinting.
Rose Buckler.name: Rose Buckler

Runald's Band.description: 8% chance on hit to strike an enemy with a runic ice blast, slowing them by 80% and dealing 250% (+125% per stack) TOTAL damage.
Runald's Band.name: Runald's Band
Runald's Band.flavorText: Chance on hit to strike an enemy with a runic ice blast.

Ukulele.description: 25% chance to fire chain lighting for 80% TOTAL damage on up to 3 (+2 per stack) targets within 20m (+2m per stack).
Ukulele.name: Ukulele

War Horn.description: Activating your Equipment gives you +70% attack speed for 8s (+4s per stack).
War Horn.name: War Horn
War Horn.flavorText: Activating your Equipment gives you a burst of attack speed.

Wax Quail.description: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward by 10m (+10m per stack).
Wax Quail.name: Wax Quail
Wax Quail.flavorText: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward.

Will-o'-the-wisp.description: On killing an enemy, spawn a lava pillar in a 12m (+2.4m per stack) radius for 350% (+280% per stack) base damage.
Will-o'-the-wisp.name: Will-o'-the-wisp

57 Leaf Clover.description: All random effects are rolled +1 (+1 per stack) times for a favorable outcome.
57 Leaf Clover.name: 57 Leaf Clover

Aegis.description: Healing past full grants you a temporary barrier for 50% (+50% per stack) of the amount you healed.
Aegis.name: Aegis
Aegis.flavorText: Healing past full grants you a temporary barrier.

Alien Head.description: Reduce skill cooldowns by 25% (+25% per stack).
Alien Head.name: Alien Head

Brainstalks.description: Upon killing an elite monster, enter a frenzy for 4s (+4s per stack) where skills have no cooldowns.
Brainstalks.name: Brainstalks
Brainstalks.flavorText: Skills have NO cooldowns for a short period after killing an elite.

Brilliant Behemoth.description: All your attacks explode in a 4m (+2.5m per stack) radius for a bonus 60% TOTAL damage to nearby enemies.
Brilliant Behemoth.name: Brilliant Behemoth

Ceremonial Dagger.description: Killing an enemy fires out 3 homing daggers that deal 150% (+150% per stack) base damage.
Ceremonial Dagger.name: Ceremonial Dagger
Ceremonial Dagger.flavorText: Killing an enemy releases homing daggers.

Dio's Best Friend.description: Upon death, this item will be consumed and you will return to life with 3 seconds of invulnerability.
Dio's Best Friend.name: Dio's Best Friend

Frost Relic.description: Killing an enemy surrounds you with an ice storm that deals 600% damage per second. The storm grows with every kill, increasing its radius by 1m. Stacks up to 6m (+6m per stack).
Frost Relic.name: Frost Relic
Frost Relic.flavorText: Killing enemies surrounds you with an ice storm.

H3AD-5T v2.description: Increase jump height. Creates a 10m radius kinetic explosion on hitting the ground, dealing 2300% base damage that scales up with speed. Recharges in 10 (-50% per stack) seconds.
H3AD-5T v2.name: H3AD-5T v2
H3AD-5T v2.flavorText: Increase jump height. Hold 'Use' to slam down to the ground.

Happiest Mask.description: Killing enemies has a 7% chance to spawn a ghost of the killed enemy with 1500% damage. Lasts 30s (+30s per stack).
Happiest Mask.name: Happiest Mask
Happiest Mask.flavorText: Chance on killing an enemy to summon a ghost.

Hardlight Afterburner.description: Add +2 (+2 per stack) charges of your Utility skill. Reduces Utility skill cooldown by 33%.
Hardlight Afterburner.name: Hardlight Afterburner
Hardlight Afterburner.flavorText: Add 2 extra charges of your Utility skill. Reduce Utility skill cooldown.

N'kuhana's Opinion.description: Store 100% (+100% per stack) of healing as Soul Energy. After your Soul Energy reaches 10% of your maximum health, fire a skull that deals 250% of your Soul Energy as damage.
N'kuhana's Opinion.name: N'kuhana's Opinion

Resonance Disc.description: Killing enemies charges the Resonance Disc. The disc launches itself toward a target for 300% base damage (+300% per stack), piercing all enemies it doesn't kill, and then explodes for 1000% base damage (+1000% per stack). Returns to the user, striking all enemies along the way for 300% base damage (+300% per stack).
Resonance Disc.name: Resonance Disc
Resonance Disc.flavorText: Obtain a Resonance Disc charged by killing enemies. Fires automatically when fully charged.

Sentient Meat Hook.description: 20% (+20% per stack) chance on hit to fire homing hooks at up to 10 (+5 per stack) enemies for 100% TOTAL damage.
Sentient Meat Hook.name: Sentient Meat Hook
Sentient Meat Hook.flavorText: Chance to hook all nearby enemies.

Shattering Justice.description: After hitting an enemy 5 times, reduce their armor by 60 for 8 (+8 per stack) seconds.
Shattering Justice.name: Shattering Justice
Shattering Justice.flavorText: Reduce the armor of enemies after repeatedly striking them.

Soulbound Catalyst.description: Kills reduce equipment cooldown by 4s (+2s per stack).
Soulbound Catalyst.name: Soulbound Catalyst

Unstable Tesla Coil.description: Fire out lightning that hits 3 (+2 per stack) enemies for 200% base damage every 0.5s. The Tesla Coil switches off every 10 seconds.
Unstable Tesla Coil.name: Unstable Tesla Coil
Unstable Tesla Coil.flavorText: Shock all nearby enemies every 10 seconds.

Wake of Vultures.description: Gain the power of any killed elite monster for 8s (+5s per stack).
Wake of Vultures.name: Wake of Vultures
Wake of Vultures.flavorText: Temporarily steal the power of slain elites.

Genesis Loop.description: Falling below 25% health causes you to explode, dealing 6000% base damage. Recharges every 30 seconds (-50% per stack).
Genesis Loop.name: Genesis Loop
Genesis Loop.flavorText: Fire an electric nova at low health.

Halcyon Seed.description: Summon Aurelionite during the teleporter event. It has 100% (+50% per stack) damage and 100% (+100% per stack) health.
Halcyon Seed.name: Halcyon Seed
Halcyon Seed.flavorText: Summon Aurelionite during the Teleporter event.

Irradiant Pearl.description: Increases ALL stats by 10% (+10% per stack).
Irradiant Pearl.name: Irradiant Pearl

Little Disciple.description: Fire a tracking wisp for 100% (+100% per stack) damage. Fires every 0.5 seconds while sprinting.
Little Disciple.name: Little Disciple

Pearl.description: Increases maximum health by 10% (+10% per stack).
Pearl.name: Pearl

Queen's Gland.description: Every 30 seconds, summon a Beetle Guard with bonus 300% damage and 100% health. Can have up to 1 (+1 per stack) Guards at a time.
Queen's Gland.name: Queen's Gland

Titanic Knurl.description: Increase maximum health by 40 (+40 per stack) and health regeneration by 1.6 (+1.6 per stack) health / second.
Titanic Knurl.name: Titanic Knurl

Brittle Crown.description:
30% chance on hit to gain 2 gold (+2 per stack). Scales over time.

Lose gold on taking damage equal to 100% (+100% per stack) of the maximum health percentage you lost.
Brittle Crown.name: Brittle Crown
Brittle Crown.flavorText: Gain gold on hit... BUT lose gold on getting hit.

Corpsebloom.description: Heal +100% (+100% per stack) more. All healing is applied over time. Can heal for a maximum of 10% (reduced by 50% per stack) of your health per second.
Corpsebloom.name: Corpsebloom
Corpsebloom.flavorText: Double your healing... BUT it's applied over time.

Gesture of the Drowned.description: Reduce Equipment cooldown by 50% (+15% per stack). Forces your Equipment to activate whenever it is off cooldown.
Gesture of the Drowned.name: Gesture of the Drowned
Gesture of the Drowned.flavorText: Dramatically reduce Equipment cooldown... BUT it automatically activates.

Shaped Glass.description: Increase base damage by 100% (+100% per stack). Reduce maximum health by 50% (+50% per stack).
Shaped Glass.name: Shaped Glass
Shaped Glass.flavorText: Double your damage... BUT halve your health.

Strides of Heresy.description:
Replace your Utility Skill with Shadowfade.

Fade away, becoming intangible and gaining +30% movement speed. Heal for 25% (+25% per stack) of your maximum health. Lasts 3 (+3 per stack) seconds.
Strides of Heresy.name: Strides of Heresy

Transcendence.description: Convert all but 1 health into regenerating shields. Gain 50% (+25% per stack) maximum health.
Transcendence.name: Transcendence
Transcendence.flavorText: Convert all your health into shield. Increase maximum health.

Visions of Heresy.description:
Replace your Primary Skill with Hungering Gaze.

Fire a flurry of tracking shards that detonate after a delay, dealing 120% base damage. Hold up to 12 charges (+12 per stack) that reload after 2 seconds (+2 per stack).
Visions of Heresy.name: Visions of Heresy
Visions of Heresy.flavorText: Replace your Primary Skill with 'Hungering Gaze'.

Focus Crystal.description: Increase damage to enemies within 13m by 15% (+15% per stack).
Focus Crystal.name: Focus Crystal
Focus Crystal.flavorText: Deal bonus damage to nearby enemies.
